item.title: Pity About Earth...
item.description: Play now! Humanity, listen up. This is the Universe. I am sick of you sticking your nose where it doesn’t belong. That’s why there’s a huge asteroid heading straight for your pitiful Earth, courtesy of yours truly. I see you’ve built a flimsy Barrier and a stockpile of Missiles, but it won’t help. Enjoy the end times! Bye-bye. Talk soon. – The Universe The weekend before Ludum Dare, I wrote a post about preparing for Ludum Dare 38.
